Posts.EditableText:
Hi all,

I am curios about how old people in this community are. So I created a simple poll here: http://www.polljunkie.com/poll/axeyay/textadventures-community-ages

Totally anonymous, no need to register or anything.

If you want to check on the results, they are here: http://www.polljunkie.com/poll/pqmnra/textadventures-community-ages/view
